Search objects within a space

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"Request"}></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Space ID","in":"path","name":"space_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set","in":"query","name":"offset","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0}},{"description":"The number of items to return","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"type":"integer","maximum":1000,"default":100}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>
